mapper.insert: insert into MBR ( MBR_ID, MBR_NAME, MBR_PHONE_NO, MBR_PHOTO_URL, MBR_GENDER, MBR_REG_DATE) values (#{mbrId}, #{mbrName}, #{mbrPhoneNo}, #{mbrPhotoUrl}, #{mbrGender}, now() )
mapper.select: select MBR_ID as mbrId, MBR_NAME as mbrName, MBR_PHONE_NO as mbrPhoneNo, MBR_PHOTO_URL as mbrPhotoUrl, MBR_GENDER as mbrGender, MBR_REG_DATE as mbrRegDate from MBR where MBR_ID = #{value}
